titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: OFFENCE HISTORY INDICATION CODE - Description

body.p: An indication of whether the PATIENT has a history of offences, including index offences (i.e. the offence is recordable, committed in England or Wales and is prosecuted by the police. Breach of the peace offences are not included).
This is completed by CARE PROFESSIONALS based on PATIENT history or may be informed by referral information.
